original_text: I rejoiced in the Lord greatly that now at length you have revived your concern for me. You were indeed concerned for me, but you had no opportunity.
korean_text: 내가 주 안에서 크게 기뻐함은 너희가 나를 생각하던 것이 이제 다시 싹이 남이니 너희가 또한 이를 위하여 생각은 하였으나 기회가 없었느니라

sentences.original_text: I rejoiced in the Lord greatly
that now at length you have revived your concern for me
sentences.korean_translation: 마침내 당신이 나에 대한 염려를 다시 살렸습니다

sentences.original_text: You were indeed concerned for me
